challenge.game-description: You will get 5 locations in the world. Can you pinpoint the exact location of where you are at? Game on!
challenge.country-streak-challenge-title: You've been challenged to a Country Streak
challenge.you-need-account: To play a GeoGuessr challenge you need an account. But don't worry, it's a butter smooth process that only takes a minute.
challenge.us-state-streak-challenge-titl: You've been challenged to a US State Streak
challenge.game-is-starting: The game is about to start!
challenge.try-to-beat: Can you beat your friends score?
challenge.can-you-get-a-better-score-tha: Can you get a better score than {0}?
challenge.couldnt-find-user-with-that-id: Couldn't find a user with that ID.
challenge.only-invited-players-can-play-: Only invited players can play this challenge.
challenge.this-challenge-is-invite-only: This challenge is invite only. Ask the challenger to go to this page and add you to the allow list.
